publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4282 Christine May: Congratulations to Scottish Business—That the Parliament congratulates the 10 Scottish businesses which recently received the Queen’s Award for Enterprise; notes that three awards were made to firms located in Glenrothes: Velux, Ardmel and Haldane; recognises that these firms are all in the manufacturing sector; acknowledges that these and many other Scottish businesses are using their management and workforce skills to innovate and improve productivity, processes and profitability, and further recognises the role that awards like the Queen’s Award for Enterprise play in encouraging others to follow their example and help to grow the Scottish economy.
S2M-4282 Congratulations to Scottish Business (lodged on 24 April 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4282 Christine May: Congratulations to Scottish Business—That the Parliament congratulates the 10 Scottish businesses which recently received the Queen’s Award for Enterprise; notes that three awards were made to firms located in Glenrothes: Velux, Ardmel and Haldane; recognises that these firms are all in the manufacturing sector; acknowledges that these and many other Scottish businesses are using their management and workforce skills to innovate and improve productivity, processes and profitability, and further recognises the role that awards like the Queen’s Award for Enterprise play in encouraging others to follow their example and help to grow the Scottish economy. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-4282 Congratulations to Scottish Business (lodged on 24 April 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
